    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3733</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Les normes del joc i el reglament esportiu</string>
            <string language="en">Rules of a game and sports regulations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtlinien eines Spiels und der Sportregelungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règles d'un jeu et des règlements de sports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Réguas de um jogo e de regulamentos dos 
esportes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regole di un gioco e delle regolazioni di sport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κανόνες ενός παιχνιδιού και των αθλητικών κανονισμών</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta (PAR) que presenta les diferències entre les regles d'un joc i un reglament esportiu, i la seva validesa com a codi de normes als jocs i esports.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the differences between the rules of a game and the regulations governing a sport, both of which are codes of conduct.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">esport de competició</string>
            <string language="en">competitive sport</string>
            <string language="es">deporte de competición</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació física</string>
            <string language="en">physical education</string>
            <string language="es">educación física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">esport</string>
            <string language="en">sport</string>
            <string language="es">deporte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf den
Unterschieden zwischen den Richtlinien eines Spiels und den 
Regelungen, die einen Sport regeln, von dem beide Verhaltenskodexe 
sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur les 
différences entre les règles d'un jeu et les règlements régissant 
un sport, dont tous les deux sont des codes de conduite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) nas diferenças entre 
as réguas de um jogo e os regulamentos que governam um esporte, ambos
que são códigos de conduta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulle differenze fra 
le norme di un gioco e le regolazioni che governano uno sport, 
entrambi cui sono codici di comportamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στις διαφορές μεταξύ των 
κανόνων ενός παιχνιδιού και των κανονισμών που κυβερνούν έναν 
αθλητισμό, και οι δύο από τους οποίους είναι κώδικες 
δεοντολογίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konkurrierender Sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sport concurrentiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel didactique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esporte do competidor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esporte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">materiais de ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sport competitivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiali didattici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανταγωνιστικός αθλητισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αθλητισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικά υλικά</string>
          </keyword>
